title: Severe bleeding
body: 1) Direct pressure. 2) Elevate limb if possible. 3) Do not remove soaked dressings—add more. 4) Call 112.

title: Burn
body: 1) Cool with water 15–20 min (no ice). 2) Remove jewelry/loose clothing. 3) Dry sterile dressing. 4) Call 112 if face/airway/large area.

title: Choking (adult)
body: 1) Encourage coughing. 2) 5 back blows. 3) 5 abdominal thrusts. 4) Alternate 5+5; if unconscious start CPR and call 112.
